title: Playwright
description: Microsoft's modern end-to-end testing framework. Extremely fast, supports multiple tabs, intercepts network requests, and works perfectly with modern SPAs.

title: Selenium
description: The grandfather of browser automation. Supports multiple programming languages (Java, Python, JS, etc.) and all major browsers. The infrastructure of web testing.

title: Cypress
description: Developer-friendly front-end testing tool. Features time-travel debugging and real-time reloading. Makes E2E testing as easy as unit testing.

title: Appium
description: The de facto standard for mobile automation. Supports cross-platform automation for iOS, Android, and Windows apps based on the WebDriver protocol.

title: Airtest
description: A cross-platform UI automation framework for games and apps from NetEase. Uses image recognition technology, making it ideal for game testing.

title: Maestro
description: The simplest and most effective mobile UI testing framework. Define flows in YAML, run without compiling the app. High stability and easy to set up.

title: Detox
description: Gray box end-to-end testing and automation framework for React Native mobile apps. Reduces flakiness by synchronizing with the app.

title: Apifox
description: All-in-one API collaboration platform. Integrates API documentation, debugging, Mocking, and automated testing. A superior alternative to Postman + Swagger.

title: Postman
description: The world's most popular API development platform. Powerful features for API debugging, automated collections, mock servers, and collaboration.

title: Bruno
description: Open-source API client, a lightweight alternative to Postman. Offline-first, git-friendly, and stores collections directly in your filesystem.

title: MeterSphere
description: An open-source enterprise-class continuous testing platform. Covers test tracking, API testing, UI testing, and performance testing in one unified system.

title: Apache JMeter
description: The classic open-source load testing tool. Java-based, extremely powerful, supports various protocols (HTTP, JDBC, etc.) for performance measurement.

title: k6
description: A modern load testing tool built for developers. Write tests in JavaScript, run them in Go. Perfect for integrating performance checks into CI/CD pipelines.

title: Gatling
description: High-performance load testing framework powered by Scala and Akka. Excellent for stress testing with real-time metrics and beautiful HTML reports.

title: Charles Proxy
description: A web proxy (HTTP Proxy / HTTP Monitor) that runs on your own computer. Essential for debugging network requests, throttling, and SSL sniffing.

title: Fiddler Everywhere
description: The robust web debugging proxy for any browser, system or platform. Edit and debug network traffic with ease.

title: Burp Suite
description: The swiss army knife for web security testing. Contains an interception proxy, spider, vulnerability scanner, and more. A must-have for pentesters.

title: Testcontainers
description: A library to support JUnit tests, providing lightweight, throwaway instances of common databases, Selenium web browsers, or anything else that can run in a Docker container.

title: Mockaroo
description: A realistic data generator. Let's you generate up to 1,000 rows of realistic test data in CSV, JSON, SQL, and Excel formats for free.

title: axe-core
description: The world's leading accessibility testing engine. Automated accessibility testing for your Android, iOS, and Web applications.

title: Jenkins
description: The leading open source automation server. With hundreds of plugins, it supports building, deploying and automating any project.

title: GitLab CI
description: Built-in Continuous Integration for GitLab. Defined by .gitlab-ci.yml, it is seamlessly integrated with your repository and highly popular.

title: SonarQube
description: The leading tool for automatic code review. Detects bugs, vulnerabilities, and code smells across 20+ programming languages.

title: Wireshark
description: The world's foremost network protocol analyzer. It lets you see what's happening on your network at a microscopic level.

title: OWASP ZAP
description: The world's most popular free security scanner. Maintained by OWASP, ideal for finding security vulnerabilities in web apps during development.

title: sqlmap
description: Automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool. Extremely powerful, supports database fingerprinting and exploitation.

title: Metasploit
description: The world's most used penetration testing framework. Verify vulnerabilities and manage security assessments with a massive exploit database.

title: JUnit 5
description: The standard unit testing framework for Java. JUnit 5 is the next generation, offering modularity, parameterized tests, and dynamic tests.

title: Pytest
description: The most powerful testing framework in the Python ecosystem. Simple syntax, massive plugin ecosystem, used for unit, API, and UI testing.

title: TestNG
description: A testing framework inspired by JUnit and NUnit, but introducing new functionalities like dependency testing, parallel execution, and data providers.

title: Mocha
description: A feature-rich JavaScript test framework running on Node.js and in the browser. Highly flexible, often used with Chai assertions.

title: Regex101
description: The best online regular expression debugger. Supports PCRE, Python, Go, and more, providing real-time explanation and match highlighting.

title: JSONPath Finder
description: Essential tool for API testing. Paste JSON, click a node, and get the corresponding JSONPath expression immediately.

title: Google Lighthouse
description: Open-source, automated tool for improving the quality of web pages. Audits performance, accessibility, SEO, and more.

title: BrowserStack
description: The world's largest cloud testing platform. Provides 3000+ real devices and browsers for manual and automated testing.

title: Sauce Labs
description: A pioneering cloud testing platform and major contributor to Selenium. Provides highly stable automated testing environments.

title: Visual Studio Code
description: The most popular code editor. Extensive plugin ecosystem with official support for Playwright, Cypress, Postman, making it a top choice for QA.

title: IntelliJ IDEA
description: The ultimate IDE for Java developers. Unmatched intelligent coding assistance and perfect integration with JUnit, TestNG, and Selenium.

title: DBeaver
description: Universal database tool. Supports MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle, SQLite, and almost all other databases. Essential for checking test data.

title: Docker
description: Standard for containerization. Used to quickly spin up test environments (Selenium Grid, DBs) ensuring consistency across dev, test, and prod.

title: Testing Library
description: A family of testing utilities that encourages testing from the user's perspective. Write maintainable tests that don't break with implementation changes.

title: Keploy
description: Open-source API testing platform that auto-generates tests from API calls. Record real traffic and replay it as test cases with zero code changes.
